description: Rod Daily is alone and chilling out one fine afternoon, overlooking the scenic hillside through his telescope, when he happens to catch a glimpse of his neighbors getting a bit frisky by the pool. As he watches them fuck on the diving board, he gets excited, and his dick gets so hard he has no choice but to pull it out and long-stroke it, ultimately climaxing in a sticky mess all over himself.  Enjoy!
title: DAILY SCOPE
